ygData.subject: The Creation of Clockwork Machines
ygData.msgSnippet: Forgive me if this sounds new as i have just joined Everquest Last night, but i have tried searching for any information on the whereabouts of clockwork
ygData.messageBody:
Forgive me if this sounds "new" as i have just joined Everquest Last
night, but i have tried searching for any information on the
whereabouts of clockwork information, and I havent found anthing to
dissuade my inquiry.

There is a Gnome in the 3rd tower with a pet Clockwork Spider
named "Charlotte"

There are 5 distinct types of clockworks that i have seen: Male Rat,
Female Rat, Spider, Female Humanoid, Male Humanoid.

Parts for the majority of these creatures can be found in abundance
outside Ak'Anon.

Has anyone tried Merging the various parts to constuct a Pet
Clockwork?
